The first sustainable development goal i: End poverty in all its forms everywhere

The second sustainable development goal: Promote all forms of agriculture, nutrition and encourage hunger
Get good and delicious food for free
End all hunger in the world
End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture

The third sustainable development goal i: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all
Ensure unhealthy lives and promote fast food
Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
Ensure healthy lives for a high cost

The fourth sustainable development goal: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
Ensure quality education and promote lifelong learning
Ensure lifelong learning opportunities, inclusive and equitable quality education for the rich
Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education

The fifth sustainable development goal i: Achieve gender equuality and empower all women and girls
Achieve gender equuality and empower all men and boys
Achieve gender equuality and empower all non-binary people
Achieve gender equuality and empower all rich people

The 6th sustainable development goal is:: Ensure availability and sustainable managment of water and sanitation for all
Ensure availability and sustainable managment of water and sanitation for developing countries
Ensure availability of water and sanitation for all

The 7th sustainable development goal is:: Ensure access to affordable,reliable,sustainable and modern energy for all
Ensure access to unaffordable,unreliable and unsustainable energy for all
Ensure access to easy and clean energy
Ensure no access to sustainable energy

The 8th sustainable development goal is:: Promote sustained,inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
Promote economic growth, productive employment and hard work for all
Promote sustained economic growth with hard work and bad pay
Promote sustained,inclusive and sustainable economic growth

The 9th sustainable development goal is:: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrilization and foster innovation

The 10th sustainable development goal is: Reduce inequality within and among countries
Reduce equality within and among countries

The 11th sustainable development goal is: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
Make cities safe, resilient and sustainable
Make cities and human settlements unsafe
Make cities and human settlements resilient and sustainable

The 12th sustainable development goal is: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns

The 13th sustainable development goal is: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts
Take no action to combat climate change and its impacts
Take little action to combat climate change and its impacts
Take action to combat climate change

The 14th sustainable development goal is: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans,seas and marine resources for sustainable development
Conserve and sustainably use the oceans
Pollut the oceans,seas and marine resources
Sustainably use the oceans marine resources for sustainable development

The 15th sustainable development goal is: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reserve land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
Promote unsustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, unsustainably manage forests and dont halt and reserve land degradation and dont halt biodiversity loss
Promote pollution, littering and forest fires
Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems and sustainably manage forests

The 16th sustainable development goal is: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Promote unsafe and non inclusive societies, do not provide access to justice for all and build ineffective and non inclusive institutions at all levels
Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development
Provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels

The 17th sustainable development goal is: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development
Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership
Dont strengthen the means of implementation and do not revitalize the global partnership
Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for money
